home.title: Home
home.description: May peace and blessings be with you always
home.dailyReminder0: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of the night and the day are signs for those of understanding.
home.dailyReminder1: And to your Lord direct your longing.
home.dailyReminder2: And do good; indeed, Allah loves the doers of good.
home.dailyReminder3: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
home.dailyReminder4: Indeed, with hardship comes ease. So when you have finished, then stand up for worship. And to your Lord direct your longing.
home.dailyReminder5: O you who have believed, when the call is made for prayer on the day of Jumu'ah, then proceed to the remembrance of Allah and leave trade.
home.dailyReminder6: And ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is Merciful and Affectionate.

tilawah.title: Recitation
tilawah.description: Practice your Quran recitation with AI assistance

tilawah.microphonePermissionDesc: Required to record and analyze your recitation

tilawah.stableConnection: • Ensure stable internet connection while downloading
tilawah.canDelete: • Can be deleted anytime if not needed
tilawah.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the AI model? Size: {{size}}MB. You'll need to re-download to use this feature again.

tilawah.step1: 1. Enter the Quran verse you want to practice
tilawah.step2: 2. Press Start button to begin the session
tilawah.step3: 3. Recite each word clearly with proper tajweed
tilawah.recordingFailed: Failed to record audio. Check your microphone permissions.
tilawah.tipsDescription:
• Read slowly and clearly
• Ensure correct tajweed pronunciation
• Use in a quiet place for best results
• Hold device close to your mouth
• Repeat incorrect words until correct
